55  unsigned long long& key() { return m_key; }

62 
63  friend bool operator<(const SortKey& k1, const SortKey& k2) {
64  return k1.m_key < k2.m_key;
65  }
66 
67  operator QString() const {
68  return bitStr(m_key);
69  }

72 
73  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
76 
78 
84  template<typename T>
85  bool setBits(T value, size_t n, size_t numBits = sizeof(T) * 8, size_t rightShift = 0) {
86  unsigned long long longValue = value;
87  longValue = longValue >> rightShift;
88 
89  size_t numBitsType = sizeof(T) * 8;
90  if (n + numBits > 64) {
91 #ifdef DEBUG_MODE
92  Logger::Throw("Error, cannot set this many bits");
93 #endif
94  return false;
95  }
96 
97  unsigned long long int mask = 0;
98  size_t i;
99  unsigned long long one = 1;
100  for (i = 0; i < numBits; i++) {
101  mask |= one << (i + n);
102  }
103 
104  unsigned long long shiftedMaskedValue = (longValue << n) & mask;
105 
106 #ifdef DEBUG_MODE
107  if (shiftedMaskedValue != (longValue << n) && numBits >= numBitsType) {
108  Logger::Throw("Error, bits lost in conversion");
109  }
110 #endif
111 
112  // Clear mask region from key
113  m_key &= ~mask;
114 
115  // Set value in key
116  m_key |= shiftedMaskedValue;
117 
118  return true;
119  }
120 
122 
123 protected:
124  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
127 
129  template<typename T>
130  static QString bitStr(T val) {
131  QString out;
132  size_t numBits = sizeof(val) * 8;
133  unsigned long long i;
134  unsigned long long one = 1;
135  for (i = one << (numBits - 1); i > 0; i = i / 2) {
136  out += (val & i) ? "1" : "0";
137  }
138 
139  return out;
140  }
141 
143 
144  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
147 
149  unsigned long long m_key = 0;
151 
152 };
153 
154 
156 } // End namespaces
157 
158 #endif
